page.title: 08LEISURE IN OLDBURY
page.content: There are quite a few organized clubs for children and adults in our village. There is a club for children on a Double Decker bus, with computers, space invader games, pinball and a tuck shop. For the adults there is a boating club, cricket club, football club and the Village Hall is used both by children and adults for tap dancing, keep fit and whist drives. Lots of people race pigeons and fishing along the Severn is popular. Many of the children have their own ponies and take part in gymkhanas around Oldbury. Gardening is popular among the older adults.
